text: (And thou (O Muhammad) seest the angels thronging round the Throne, hymning the praises of their Lord) by the command of Allah. (And they are judged) and it is judged between the prophets and their nations (aright) with justice. (And it is said) to them after the end of reckoning, say: (Praise be to Allah) thanks and gratitude belong to Allah, (the Lord of the Worlds!) the Master of the jinn and human beings Who separated us apart from our enemies, this is the station of Ha Mim, and He is the Mighty, the Knower'.
